Heading: Flexo Printing Machine
Description: Nessco India a leading manufacturer of flexo printing machine. We offer a flexographic printing machine that supports multi-colour printing and is equipped with ultraviolet infrared drying devices which are fixed at each print unit. It has an accurate color printing process as it uses rolling materials. It has a meter counter that can set printing quantity and color usability as per utility. This machine is equipped with hydraulic systems which assists independent unwinding and rewinding of paper roll. One can complete the whole roll to roll printing process in one machine including unwinding (feeding paper roll), printing in various colors, infrared drying and rewinding (assorting printed paper in one roll) as well.
PointsHeadingDesc: High Speed Flexo Printing machine is fully automated and self-sufficient. It performs various functions including feeding paper webs, printing, automatic infrared (UV) drying all by itself. The flexographic printing machine supports multi-colored printing and is operated by one side winding and the other rewinding. It increases the overall accuracy and speed of printing which gives users an additive advantage.
ImageDescription: Nessco Flexo Printing Machine is capable of controlling the entire printing process. It can print up to 120 meters per minute of width up to 930 mm. The heavy frame of the machine ensures that there are minimal noise and vibration during operation. It increases the accuracy of printing and also increases the overall production capacity. It supports multi-colour printing and is equipped with ultraviolet infrared drying devices which are fixed at each print unit.
